title: My GPS location will not update. It is stuck where I was a week ago over 600 miles away Maps useless
content: GPS is not accurate. Restarted my phone, turned off and on wifi, turned off and on 'use location', cleared the cache on Google maps, recalibrated my compass. Checked for updates to maps. Nothing working. I'm still showing up at a location I was last week over 600 miles away.
